name: Aliens: The Computer Game
overview: Based on the science fiction thriller, Aliens the computer game takes you into confrontations with the most ruthless creatures ever to appear on the cinema screen. Your mission is to keep control of the base by any means, while keeping your crew members alive. You command six crew members from the Mobile Tactical Command Bay outside the base. You need to coordinate the actions of the six crew members. You are about to realize, Ripley was right after all...
